mapper.select: select role.role_id,role_name,role_sign,remark,user_id_create,menuIdStr,gmt_create,gmt_modified from sys_role role left join (select role_id,group_concat(menu_id) as menuIdStr from sys_role_menu where role_id=#{value} group by role_id ) as menu on role.role_id = menu.role_id where role.role_id = #{value};
mapper.insert: insert into sys_role ( `role_name`, `role_sign`, `remark`, `user_id_create`, `gmt_create`, `gmt_modified` ) values ( #{roleName}, #{roleSign}, #{remark}, #{userIdCreate}, sysdate(), sysdate() )
